Q_DESC:
To write a menu driven program in which the user has to perform operations in doubly linked list (DELETION).
The MENU is supposeed to look like the below example:
1. Create List
2. Delete node - from beginning
3. Display list
0. Exit
The user is supposed to use the exact numberings as shown above.
INPUT:
1 //create list(option 1 in menu)
5 //number of elements in the list
10 //element one
20 //eleement two
30 //element three
40 //element four
50 //element five
3 //display list(option 3 in menu)
2 //delete node begining(option 2 in menu)
3 //display list(option 3 in menu)
0 //Exit(option 0 in menu) 
OUTPUT:
DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 11
DATA of 2 node = 22
DATA of 3 node = 33
DATA of 4 node = 44
DATA of 5 node = 55


DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 22
DATA of 2 node = 33
DATA of 3 node = 44
DATA of 4 node = 55
TESTCASE_1:
1 5 11 22  33 44 55 3 2 3 0
